Command.CommandString: select case when TASKTYPE='OB' then decode(TASKSTATUS,'1','堆垛机出库', '2','到达出库端', '3','输送机出库','完成') when TASKTYPE='IB' then decode(TASKSTATUS,'1','入库请求', '2','到达入库端', '3','堆垛机入库','完成') end as STATUSDESC ,T.* from WCS_TASK T Where {0} order by READTIME
SP_RECIVEWMSTASK
update WCS_TASK set TASKSTATUS='{0}' Where TASKID='{1}'
update WCS_TASK set TASKSTATUS='{0}' Where TASKID='{1}' and TASKSTATUS='{2}'
SP_TASKFINISHED
select * from WCS_CRANEWARNING
select * from WCS_CELL order by SHELFCODE,CELLCOLUMN,CELLROW
select distinct shelfcode from wcs_cell order by ShelfCode
Update wcs_cell set {0} where {1}
select TASK.*,STATEDESC from VIEW_WCS_TASK TASK LEFT JOIN WCS_TABLESTATE ON TASK.TASKSTATUS=WCS_TABLESTATE.STATE AND TABLENAME='WCS_TASK' AND FIELDNAME='STATE' Where {0} order by READTIME
SP_HANDLETASKERROR
select * from IDX_ASRS_SEND where {0}
SP_CANCELTASK
insert into WCS_LOGINFO(LOGLEVEL,USERID,LOGDATE,LOGMSG) values('{0}','{1}',SYSDATE,'{2}')
select * from WCS_USER Where USERID='{0}' and PWD='{1}'
select * from WCS_USER Where USERID='{0}'
INSERT INTO WCS_USER(USERID,PWD) VALUES('{0}','{1}')
update WCS_USER set PWD='{1}' where USERID='{0}'
select t.*,decode(t.ISENABLED,'1','启用', '0','禁用') as ENABLEDNAME from WCS_CRANE t order by CRANENO
update WCS_CRANE set ISENABLED='{0}' where CRANENO='{1}'
